title: New: Blaue Blume – Jealousy
content:
Having blown away a packed out Birthdays a month or so back, Denmark’s hottest new export Blaue Blume have released the final track taken from the sessions that also spawned On New Years Eve and Helen.

Of the two live shows they played in the UK, Jealousy stood out as being a fantastic indication of the songwriting skills that the group posses, and the immaculate vocals that lead singer Jonas Smith toys with. Heading back to the UK later in the year (tickets here), as well as retreating to the studio to record several new tracks, 2014 is shaping up to be a very exciting year for Blaue Blume.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
